jparsec.graph.chartRendering.frame

Class EclipseRendering

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.graph.chartRendering.frame.EclipseRendering
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EclipseRendering
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Support class to use Swing/AWT graph components for eclipse rendering.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    SkyChart, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • EclipseRendering

        public EclipseRendering(TimeElement time,
                ObserverElement obs,
                EphemerisElement eph,
                boolean solar,
                SatelliteRenderElement.PLANET_MAP map,
                int w,
                int h,
                Graphics.ANAGLYPH_COLOR_MODE colorMode,
                java.lang.String title)
                 throws JPARSECException
        Sample render constructor.
        Parameters:
        time - Time object.
        obs - Observer object.
        eph - Ephemeris object.
        solar - True for a solar eclipse, false for a lunar one.
        map - The map to use to show the eclipse.
        w - The width in pixels of the chart.
        h - The height in pixels of the chart.
        colorMode - The color mode in case anaglyph output is required.
        title - Window title.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - Thrown if the calculation fails.
